==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
* Literally: [[采]] ''chosen'' + 女 ''lady, female person''
*: In the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]], palace girls were selected from the populace. As time passed, this term gradually came to refer to any generic [[lady-in-waiting]] or palace girl.
